text: have you ever sat and watched someone
else sit and watch Family Guy for hours
on end and said to yourself hey I could
do that well now you can and it's even
easier than you might think the people
at TBS are putting Family Guy on for
three full hours a night for people just
like you with TBS watching Family Guy
has never been easier so stop talking
about sitting around and watching Family
Guy and start doing it three full hours
of Family Guy Monday starting at 88 on
